Name: Vish
AboutMe:
I love learning, and I try to keep learning.

At work

  • I am primarily a QA and Automation Developer.
  • I also build and maintain build/release infrastructure.
  • I help tighten the screws where possible through automation.
  • I research new ways of doing things, and share my knowledge with anyone that will listen.

After work

  • I explore anything and everything: Fitbit API, JIRA REST, Android App Development, Rooting, etc.
  • I whip up new dishes in the kitchen.
  • I tend to our small (but growing) garden.
  • I travel on a budget with my wife and my camera. (not in any order of preference).
